title: The Thirsty Crow
content: - (No additional content for Title Slide)
image_desc: - A cartoon crow with a worried expression, looking for water.
narration: Once upon a time, on a very hot day, a thirsty crow flew all over the fields looking for water. He was so thirsty!

title: Searching for Water
content: - The crow searched for a long time.
- He couldn't find any water.
- He felt very weak and almost gave up hope.
image_desc: - A cartoon crow flying over a dry field, looking for water.
narration: He searched and searched, but couldn't find any water. He was getting weaker and weaker. He thought he might never find water!

title: A Water Jug
content: - Suddenly, he saw a water jug below a tree.
- He flew down to see if there was any water inside.
- Yes, he could see some water!
image_desc: - A cartoon crow looking into a water jug, with a small amount of water at the bottom.
narration: Just when he was about to give up, he saw a water jug! He flew down to check if there was any water inside.  He was so happy to see some water!

title: The Problem
content: - The crow tried to push his head into the jug.
- The neck of the jug was too narrow.
- He tried to tilt the jug, but it was too heavy.
image_desc: - A cartoon crow trying to reach the water in the jug, but the neck is too narrow.
narration: But the crow couldn't reach the water! The neck of the jug was too narrow. He tried to tilt the jug, but it was too heavy.

title: A Clever Solution
content: - The crow thought hard.
- He saw some pebbles nearby.
- He had a good idea!
image_desc: - A cartoon crow looking at a pile of pebbles, with a thoughtful expression.
narration: The crow thought and thought. He looked around and saw some pebbles. He had an idea!

title: Filling the Jug
content: - The crow started picking up the pebbles.
- He dropped them one by one into the jug.
- The water level started rising.
image_desc: - A cartoon crow dropping pebbles into the water jug, raising the water level.
narration: The crow started picking up the pebbles and dropping them into the jug. One by one, the water level started rising!

title: Success!
content: - The water level rose high enough.
- The crow could finally drink!
- His plan had worked!
image_desc: - A cartoon crow drinking water from the jug, with a happy expression.
narration: Soon, the water level was high enough for the crow to drink! He was so happy! His plan had worked!

title: The Moral of the Story
content: - The crow's story teaches us a valuable lesson.
image_desc: - A cartoon crow standing on a branch, with a thought bubble showing a lightbulb.
narration: The crow's story teaches us a valuable lesson. We should always think hard and work hard to find solutions to our problems.

title: The End
content: - Thank you for watching!
image_desc: - A cartoon crow waving goodbye, with a smile on its face.
